article: ralph unk , a humorist who was a commentator on national public radio 's `` all things considered , '' a prolific contributor to magazines and newspapers , the author of ## books , and a ghostwriter whose works included bill cosby 's `` fatherhood , '' died on thursday in philadelphia .
